languages.text: "Мятеж против законной власти есть ересь! В своем ли вы уме — давать шанс еретику?"
"Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"
languages.original_text: "Мятеж против законной власти есть ересь! В своем ли вы уме — давать шанс еретику?"

traits.locale_text: "Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Offering a heretic a chance... Are you quite sane?"
"Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Offering a heretic a chance... Are you quite sane?"
"Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"
"Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"
"Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"
"Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"

languages.text: «¡Rebelarse contra la autoridad legítima se considera herejía! Como osa conceder clemencia a un hereje... ¿Está en sus cabales?».
languages.original_text: "Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Rebelarse contra la autoridad legítima se considera herejía! Como osa conceder clemencia a un hereje... ¿Está en sus cabales?».

languages.text: "Gegen eine rechtmäßige Autorität zu rebellieren, ist Ketzerei! Einem Ketzer Gnade zu gewähren ... Seid Ihr noch recht bei Verstand?"
languages.original_text: "Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"

traits.locale_text: "Gegen eine rechtmäßige Autorität zu rebellieren, ist Ketzerei! Einem Ketzer Gnade zu gewähren ... Seid Ihr noch recht bei Verstand?"

languages.text: « Se révolter contre une autorité légitime, c'est de l'hérésie ! Et faire preuve de clémence envers un hérétique... Vous êtes sûr d'avoir toute votre tête ? »
languages.original_text: "Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"

traits.locale_text: « Se révolter contre une autorité légitime, c'est de l'hérésie ! Et faire preuve de clémence envers un hérétique... Vous êtes sûr d'avoir toute votre tête ? »

languages.text: “反叛权威机构可是异端重罪！你居然打算宽大处理异端分子……你这是疯了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"

traits.locale_text: “反叛权威机构可是异端重罪！你居然打算宽大处理异端分子……你这是疯了吗？”

languages.text: 「合法的権力に逆らうのは異端だ！異端者に情けをかけるなど…君は正気か？」
languages.original_text: "Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"

traits.locale_text: 「法的権威に逆らうのは異端のすることだ！異端者に情けをかけるなんて…正気なのか？」
「合法的権力に逆らうのは異端だ！異端者に情けをかけるなど…君は正気か？」

languages.text: "Yasal otoriteye isyan etmek küfre girer! Bir kâfire merhamet eli uzatmak da nedir? Aklınız başınızda mı sizin?"
languages.original_text: "Rebelling against lawful authority is heresy! Extending clemency to a heretic... Are you in your right mind?"

traits.locale_text: "Yasal otoriteye isyan etmek küfre girer! Bir kâfire merhamet eli uzatmak da nedir? Aklınız başınızda mı sizin?"
